sentences: Olen asunut näillä kulmilla koko ikäni.
Seppele kulmillaan tarkoittaa henkilöä jolla on seppele päässä.
context: The Finnish word 'kulma' translates to corner, angle or brow in English. It can refer to a physical corner where two lines meet, an angle in geometry, the ridge above the eye (brow), or even a part of a place or region. The word declines based on case; for example, 'kulman takana' means around the corner and 'kulmissa' means in the corners. It can also be used to describe Euler angles in mathematics.
